      • setTemperatureSamplingInterval

        public void setTemperatureSamplingInterval(int temperatureSamplingInterval)

        Set the interval of sampling the temperature.

        参数:
        temperatureSamplingInterval - .Range:0x00(close temperature sensor),1000~65535(unit: ms)

        public void setLightSamplingInterval(int lightSamplingInterval)

        Set the interval of sampling light.

        参数:
        lightSamplingInterval - new interval of sampling light.Range:0x00(close light sensor),1000~65535(unit: ms)
